snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun - Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order now: https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/warhammer40000boltgun?utm_campaign=BOLTGUN_ReleaseDateReveal&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Only in death does duty end!

Focus Entertainment, Auroch Digital and Games Workshop combined their passion to bring this exciting new addition to the Warhammer 40,000 universe to life. Boltgun is a neo-retro, over-the-top shooter driven by unrestrained nostalgia for the fast-paced FPS action of the 90s—a stunningly modern boomer-shooter with fluid gameplay and glorious sprite art. 

Step into the ceramite armoured boots of a mighty battle-hardened Space Marine - charge, shoot and chainsword your way through the ruinous forces of Chaos. Unleash your holy arsenal to purge the creatures of darkness in an implacable pixel bloodbath!

Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun will be out on May 23. Pre-orders are open on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and PC.
